LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.label: acid rain
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: tale_noun->acrid smelling clouds pouring acid water near [PAWN_nameDef]'s [Community]
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: image->fields of dead plants, their leaves burned, [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: circumstance_phrase->covered by a patina of acidic water
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: circumstance_phrase->arranged in a pattern that suggests corroded bones
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: circumstance_phrase->waiting for the acidic rain to stop
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.11: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] lies on the ground, [PAWN_possessive] half-melted body twisted at an unusual angle.
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] hides near a [TerrainFeature], gazing out with a [AdjectiveAngsty] look.
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] looks on in shock with partially melted eyes.
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.14: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] rests quietly with a layer of sweat upon [PAWN_possessive] face.
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.15: desc_sentence->[Quantity_adjphrase] dead [Animal]s lay on the ground, their flesh burned by the acid.
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.16: desc_sentence->[Quantity_adjphrase] dying [Animal]s lay on the ground, their flesh dissolved by the acid.
LanguageData.AB_AcidRainTale.rulePack.rulesStrings.17: desc_sentence->[Quantity_adjphrase] [Animal]s mill around uncertainly, disoriented by the pain of the acid burns.
